name: Summoning
description:
Always wanted to be a great summoner, draw magic circles and use fancy candles? 

Then this amazing textadventure, created for the twiney game jam* by pure dark magic, is for you!

Warnig: Rituals are not for the faint-hearted and may result in bad things.

*The task provided was to write a twine game with a very limited word count. So, it is very very short.
